entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
